decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate what type of cycle parking would be accommodated on site, how much space would be available for cycles, what type of product (such as Sheffield Stand) would be provided and whether cycle parking would be sheltered. The details submitted to discharge Condition 5 of planning permission ref: 22/02039/FUL are therefore refused.

The submitted Travel Plan fails to provide any specific, measurable and timed targets and is unacceptable in Highways terms. The details submitted for the discharge of Condition 6 of planning permission ref: 22/02039/FUL are therefore refused.

The submitted Fire Statement is lacking in detail and does not fully address the requirements of Policy D12 of the London Plan (2021). The details submitted for the discharge of Condition 7 of planning permission ref: 22/02039/FUL are therefore refused.
